subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jodhpur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king is associated with the famous Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चिट्टोगर की मौलिया किस मुख्ता सम्बंधित है।
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha, also known as Kumbha Rana, is associated with the Chittorgarh Fort.
explanation_hi: रानी कुम्ब्ह, नाम से जाने के लिए, चिट्टोरगर कदोर को सम्बाधित हुया है।
